text: Active voice-এ যেখানে subject কাজ করে, passive voice-এ subject কাজ গ্রহণ করে।
exampleAnswer: A letter is written by her.

text: Simple Present tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: Verb ‘am/is/are’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The room is cleaned by him.

text: Simple Past tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: Verb ‘was/were’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: A house was built by them.

text: Present Continuous tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: ‘am/is/are being’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: A letter is being written by her.

text: Past Continuous tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: ‘was/were being’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The house was being painted by them.

text: Present Perfect tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: ‘has/have been’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The work has been done by him.

text: Past Perfect tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: ‘had been’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The project had been finished by her.

text: Future Simple tense-এর active voice এর passive voice: ‘will be’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The task will be completed by them.

text: Modal verbs-এর active voice এর passive voice: Modal + ‘be’ + past participle।
exampleAnswer: The problem can be solved by her.
